page.title: 09LLWYNYPIA PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: {OUR SCHOOL { }Our School is called Llwynypia Primary School and was built in 1896 which makes it 89 years old. There are two departments - the Infant Dept. where children attend from 3 years to 7 years and the Junior Dept. where the children range from 7 years to 11 years. We start school each day at 9.00a.m. In the morning we have Table Tests, Arithmetic, Mental Arithmetic, Reading and English. In the afternoon we have Art, Physical Education, Craft and Project Work. We go home at 3.35p.m. Playtime in the morning is at 10.30a.m In the yard we play games such as skipping, football, cricket, chasing, marbles, tennis and two balls. In the afternoon playtime is at 2.10 p.m. Lunch is at 12.00noon each day.
